text: Povedeniye nevernykh teper' trebuyet nakazaniya, potomu chto oni zapreshchayut lyudyam khodit' v Zapretnuyu mechet', v kotoroy i u kotoroy Allakh zapreshchayet vesti srazheniye. No Allakh otkladyvayet ikh nakazaniye, potomu chto znayet, chto mnogiye iz nikh stanut vernymi. V svoyom neverii oni ne mogut byt' khranitelyami Svyashchennoy mecheti, kotoruyu oskvernili idolopoklonstvom. Nastoyashchiye khraniteli Svyashchennoy mecheti tol'ko veruyushchiye, povinuyushchiyesya Allakhu. No bol'shinstvo mnogobozhnikov ne uverovali, ne znayut istinnoy religii i togo, kakoye vazhnoye znacheniye dlya musul'man imeyet Svyashchennaya mechet'
